dmca.title: [EV1-C2269663B] weaddyou.com
dmca.body:
To Whom It May Concern:

Please note that below-referenced copyright infringement notice does not
substantially comply with the required notification elements of the
Digital Millennium Copyright Act of 1998 ("DMCA").

Please note that we have not passed on the substantive merits of your
claim.

Please visit our web site at www.ev1servers.net/About/dmca.aspx

Legal Response Team

-----Original Message-----
From: abuse@ev1servers.net [mailto:abuse@ev1servers.net] 
Sent: Tuesday, December 26, 2006 6:29 PM
To: DMCA
Subject: [EV1-C2269663B] weaddyou.com

==== Forwarded Ticket ====

From: "weaddyou" <info@weaddyou.com>

MIME-Version: 1.0

        boundary="----=_NextPart_000_0069_01C72937.CA9E2390"

X-MSMail-Priority: Normal

FILETIME=[797D3940:01C7292F] 

 (multipart/alternative)
Multipart prefix (text/plain)
This is a multi-part message in MIME format. 
 
MIME element (text/plain)
Hi
 I am the owner of www.weaddyou.com and I have recently noticed that a
site at http://meoc.org/ has duplicated our entire site and content from
about 3weeks ago. 
 After looking up whois information for this domain I see they are
hosted with planet.com so I am requesting you could please remove this
content as it is owned by me. 
 Please contact me urgently regarding this matter. 
Hope to hear from you soon
 Thanks
 Allan Sykes 
 
We Add You Directory
 http://www.weaddyou.com
